name: hl7.fhir.uv.subscriptions-backport
title: Subscriptions R5 Backport
description: The Subscription R5 Backport Implementation Guide enables servers running verions of FHIR earlier than R5 to implement a subset of R5 Subscriptions in a standardized way. (built Mon, Dec 14, 2020 16:30+0000+00:00)
author: HL7 FHIR Infrastructure WG
